resources.string:
• New Statistics section in your profile
Now you can see the progress you've made and a lot of joyful information!

 • Bulgarian and Ukrainian languages are added
Welcome to the club, buddy!

 • Major UI improvements
Animations, better design, fonts, fixed visual bugs. All included!

• Less ads
Ads appear less in short tests (15 secs, 30 secs).

 • More statistics
Statistics became more informative.

 • Other improvements
Now it's shown in a typed word list if an inputted word is shorter than the original.

 • Bug fixes
Fixed a bug that caused text suggestions not to work.
Fixed a bug when statistics displayed the wrong time a user has spent on tests.

This is more of an "under the hood" update. It will make future updates much easier. • Less ads
Ads appear less in the 1-minute test.

 • Other improvements
Languages are now sorted in alphabetical order.

 What to expect next? More achievements, new game mode and some other features. Stay tuned!
